citations.desc: ATTENDING VETERINARIAN AND ADEQUATE VETERINARY CARE (DEALERS AND EXHIBITORS).
citations.narrative:
The licensee was not able to provide a written Program of Veterinary Care at the time of the inspection. The
licensee must maintain a written program when the attending veterinarian is part time and have regularly scheduled
visits to the premises of the exhibitor. When contacted the attending veterinarian acknowledged that they have a
veterinary client patient relationship but did not have a formal written arrangement on file or a regular visitation
schedule. A written program is necessary to ensure the health and safety of the animals exhibited by the licensee.
The attending veterinarian stated she has never visited the current site. Maintain a written program of veterinary
care including a regular visitation schedule when the attending veterinarian is part time.
Correct by 11/13/2018
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
